entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Newmarket
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:14 AM EST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -11.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: King City North 12:00 AM EST Friday 03 February 2023
Temperature: -11.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.5 kPa rising
Humidity: 73 %
Wind Chill: -19
Dewpoint: -15.7°C
Wind: NW 15 km/h gust 32 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Thursday night: Flurries. Low minus 23.
entry.summary: Flurries with risk of snow squalls. Local amount 5 cm. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming north 20 near midnight. Low minus 23. Wind chill minus 21 this evening and minus 33 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 10:55 PM EST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Flurries. High minus 15.
entry.summary: Flurries with risk of snow squalls. Local amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 15. Wind chill minus 34 in the morning and minus 26 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 10:55 PM EST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 24. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries in the evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light in the evening. Low minus 24. Wind chill near minus 29. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 10:55 PM EST Thursday 02 February 2023
